About Me

I love to create memorable stories and designs. I attribute much of my creative skillset to my many years involved in Improv. From that experience I learned to activity listen to the needs of my clients. And to easily adapt to the changing needs of a project. I also learned how to be supportive in a collaborative team-based environment but, still find it easy to take on solo tasks and projects when needed. I love that the Dev community is a place of collaboration, continuous learning, growth and creating.
